description: 20th October, 2024 - Today I learned about AJAX, 21st - (Promises resolve - then, reject - catch)
16th November, 2024 - Today I learned about REST and REST

4th December, 2024 - Today I learned about Call Stack. How to use the 'Sources Option' in Dev Tool and use breakpoints to visualize Call Stack. I also learnt that JS is a Single-Threaded Language, unlike C++ and Java which are multi-threaded languages - capable of doing more than one task at a time, but we have different ways of making JS act like Multi-threading using setTimeout functions and asynchornous code
